WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

it seems that the scripts does not consider volumes attached to the System via mountpoints.

We attach out LUNs using mountpoints like this:

```
E: -> LUN01
E:\Data01 -> LUN02
E:\TLOG01 -> LUN03
E:\BACKUP -> LUN04
```

Volume E:\ will be considered during the checks and can be found in the Excel and XML. The other LUNs attached using mountpoints can not be found in the XML or Excel.

Greetings,
Andre

Comments.Message: Will look into clarifying mountpoints in the next release following 1.0.2.0 (currently in beta)
I just downloaded the current version 1.0.2.2 and am still seeing this issue. Has this been resolved or is it still pending?
The same issue exists with __Cluster Shared Volumes__. Would love to see this move up the priority list.
